005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Block;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataSet;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataSet;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.misc.Extension;
016
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.FlexmarkConfiguration;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.SuppressPTagExtension;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Supports a data value which is a single line of markup.
029 * <p>
030 * This markup can be presented as XHTML or Markdown.
031 */
032public final class MarkupLine
033    extends AbstractMarkupString<MarkupLine> {
034
035  @NonNull
036  private static final DataSet FLEXMARK_CONFIG = newParserOptions();
037
038  @NonNull
039  private static final FlexmarkFactory FLEXMARK_FACTORY = FlexmarkFactory.newInstance(FLEXMARK_CONFIG);
040
041  @SuppressWarnings("null")
042  @NonNull
043  private static DataSet newParserOptions() {
044    MutableDataSet options = new MutableDataSet();
045    // disable inline HTML
046    options.set(Parser.HTML_BLOCK_PARSER, false);
047    // disable list processing
048    options.set(Parser.LIST_BLOCK_PARSER, false);
049    options.set(HtmlRenderer.SUPPRESS_HTML_BLOCKS, true);
050
051    Collection<Extension> currentExtensions = Parser.EXTENSIONS.get(FlexmarkConfiguration.instance());
052    List<Extension> extensions = new LinkedList<>(currentExtensions);
053    extensions.add(SuppressPTagExtension.newInstance());
054    Parser.EXTENSIONS.set(options, extensions);
055
056    return FlexmarkConfiguration.newFlexmarkConfig(options);
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Convert the provided HTML string into markup.
061   *
062   * @param html
063   *          the HTML
064   * @return the markup instance
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  public static MarkupLine fromHtml(@NonNull String html) {
068    return new MarkupLine(
069        parseHtml(html, FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getFlexmarkHtmlConverter(), FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Convert the provided markdown string into markup.
074   *
075   * @param markdown
076   *          the markup
077   * @return the markup instance
078   */
079  @NonNull
080  public static MarkupLine fromMarkdown(@NonNull String markdown) {
081    return new MarkupLine(parseMarkdown(markdown, FLEXMARK_FACTORY.getMarkdownParser()));
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public FlexmarkFactory getFlexmarkFactory() {
086    return FLEXMARK_FACTORY;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Construct a new single line markup instance.
091   *
092   * @param astNode
093   *          the parsed markup AST
094   */
095  protected MarkupLine(@NonNull Document astNode) {
096    super(astNode);
097    Node child = astNode.getFirstChild();
098    if (child instanceof Block && child.getNext() != null) {
099      throw new IllegalStateException("multiple blocks not allowed");
100    } // else empty markdown
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  public MarkupLine copy() {
105    // TODO: find a way to do a deep copy
106    // this is a shallow copy that uses the same underlying Document object
107    return new MarkupLine(getDocument());
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public boolean isBlock() {
112    return false;
113  }
114}
